group_1.textLeft: ...You're going to the beach with some friends?

group_1.textRight: Yes, that's right. Felicia, Ayame and I are going@on a day trip.

group_1.textLeft: That's great!@Try to make lots of good memories.
And don't worry about hunting Witches.@Just have fun.

group_1.textRight: Thanks a lot! [chara:301101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:301101:cheek_0][chara:301101:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:301101:lipSynch_1]But, you see...

group_1.textLeft: Hm?

group_1.textRight: Except for school activities, I've actually never@gone to a pool or the beach.
So could you all...help me choose a swimsuit?

group_1.textLeft: Here we are...

group_1.textRight: ...Is this going to be okay?

group_1.textLeft: There's no other way.
Kako went to some other Magical Girls@for advice but...
They weren't really helpful.

group_1.textRight: She asked Emily and Rika but...
Their recommendations were all too flashy.
Asking them for help was probably a bad idea.

group_1.textCenter: Wow, there's a lot of swimsuits to choose from.

group_1.textRight: Yeah there are.@Where do we even start...

group_1.textLeft: I get what you're saying...@Let's split up.
However, I'm not quite sure what@we're aiming for.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, me neither.
Let's do our best!@I really appreciate your help.

group_1.textLeft: Ok then, I'll look around here.
Ah, how about this?

group_1.textRight: That was fast! Thank you.
You chose this just because it was the first one@you saw, didn't you?

group_1.textLeft: Wh-what do you take me for?
They're all made for swimming.@Here, what do you think?

group_1.textRight: This...has lots of frills, doesn't it?
It's mostly made of laces and ruffles.

group_1.textLeft: Isn't it cute?

group_1.textRight: It is, but...
I don't think I can wear this.

group_1.textLeft: Eh?!

group_1.textRight: She'll stand out too much in this.@We need something more modest.

group_1.textLeft: Don't tell me, when you picked this for Kako...
Were you trying to pick something that YOU@wanted to wear?

group_1.textRight: [chara:300801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?!
Th-th-th-that's not true!

group_1.textLeft: Alright, well...@I found the perfect swimsuit for her.

group_1.textRight: Thank you! Which one is it?

group_1.textLeft: ...Unfortunately it's almost sold out.@This is the only size available in the store.
Still, you can order it.

group_1.textRight: I see, it should be okay to decide just by looking@at the design.

group_1.textLeft: Then here, a one-piece swimsuit...

group_1.textRight: A blue and white checkered pattern,@that's quite nice... [chara:301101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:301101:cheek_0][chara:301101:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:301101:lipSynch_1]Huh?

group_1.textLeft: Did you notice? Look at the belly.
It has a big bear printed onto it.
I think this would look really cute on you.

group_1.textRight: Ah, u-umm...
This is...something a little kid would wear,@isn't it?

group_1.textLeft: Eh?!

group_1.textRight: Nanaka...

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm really sorry about that.

group_1.textRight: Looks like these two are not good.@Would you look at what I chose?
Of course! I want to see what kind of swimsuit@you picked out.

group_1.textLeft: I know you love flowers so...
A one-piece swimsuit with a big sunflower@printed on it.

group_1.textRight: You guys...really think I look like a child, huh?

group_1.textLeft: Eh?!
Sunflower's aren't good either?!@Compared to a bear, it's way better!
Looks like you don't get it, so let me explain.
It doesn't matter if it's a bear or a sunflower.
If the belly has a design printed onto it,
then it's clearly a swimsuit made for@younger children.

group_1.textRight: [chara:301201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
That's...
So when I recommended that swimsuit,@I hurt her feelings, didn't I?

group_1.textLeft: It seems that we weren't any help at all.

group_1.textCenter: Th-this one looks good, I'm going to try it on!

group_1.textLeft: It really suits you.

group_1.textRight: Thank you!

group_1.textLeft: In the end, she chose one by herself.@That might be for the best.
We didn't help one bit.

group_1.textRight: Eh?! That's not true!
Everyone worked really hard to help me find@the perfect swimsuit. I'm really, really happy.
Because of that, the reason I chose@this swimsuit is...
that it has everyone's recommendations!
Ah, that's true! There are frills!
It also has a sunflower motif...@But it's a checkered pattern one-piece.
So in the end everyone helped a little bit.@That makes me happy.

group_1.textLeft: We all chose it together.
I'm quite glad that this wasn't a waste of time.

group_1.textRight: Besides, this was really fun!

group_1.textLeft: Going shopping in a group like this was@a nice change of pace.

group_1.textRight: Yes!
